subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mario Lemieux, the Penguins’ owner, renewed the threat of moving the N.H.L. team out of Pittsburgh, as local officials scrambled to begin negotiations to build the team a new arena in the wake of a failed plan tied to a casino deal.
